Room.Name: North Village Gate
Room.ShortDescription: You are inside the north village gate of Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: This gate is closed at sundown to avoid being overrun by mountain trolls and other unwelcome creatures. Promptly at sunrise the gates are opened to traffic. Most of the stuff you see in the shops in Brownhaven is brought in by travelers or the monthly caravan. South is the intersection of Goldenrod Avenue and Main Street.
